name: Chart for hours Donated
query:
SELECT 
    sdg.sdg AS sdg_name,
    COALESCE(SUM(act.hours), 0) AS total_hours
FROM 
    `tabSDG` AS sdg
LEFT JOIN `tabSDGs Child` AS sdc 
    ON sdg.name = sdc.sdgs
LEFT JOIN `tabActivity` AS act 
    ON act.name = sdc.parent AND sdc.parentfield = 'sdgs'
GROUP BY 
    sdg.sdg
ORDER BY 
    sdg_name ASC;
